issue.title: www.crunchyroll.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.crunchyroll.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.crunchyroll.com) ### Comment > As you can see in the first screenshot the filter AdGuard Annoyances hides a window that's not an annoyance. That window only serves to show the recently released episodes and it's actually useful. > Removing this line :"crunchyroll.com##.welcome-featured-media" should fix the issue. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/RAGQkQB.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/xGJqei2.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin 1.42.4 Browser: | Opera Filters: | Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

comment.body:
Hi, I'm the author of this issue. I just tested this again and on my end that is not an empty window. To test this:
- I deleted all cookies
- I disabled every extension except for uBlock Origin 
- In uBlock Origin I disabled all the filters
- I downloaded the latest AdGuard Annoyances file from [here](https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/14.txt)
- I deleted line 114 and 115 from it using a text editor
   114. ! https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/115444
   115. crunchyroll.com##.welcome-featured-media
- I imported the modified file in the my filters section in uBlock Origin

The end result is this:

<details>
<summary>With my modified AdGuard Annoyances:</summary>
![Opera Snapshot_2022-05-24_003308_www crunchyroll com](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/106120144/169915437-28f4beab-26a1-40f4-bf21-cb0be100ec17.png)
</details>

<details>
<summary>With original AdGuard Annoyances:</summary>
![Opera Snapshot_2022-05-24_004550_www crunchyroll com](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/106120144/169916592-bbfd85a2-1bf2-44aa-9b22-121a3d83febb.png)
</details>

I think that's a problem on your end because as you can see the window is not empty.

comment.body:
Membership is required to check the service.

Problem is being caused by `Fanboy's Social Blocking List` filter. 
<details>
 <summary>Screenshot</summary>

![fbs](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/104112959/169925995-b67c9306-0dae-4e13-b5c5-c027ac206883.png)


</details>

Unblocking these two rules fixes the issue.

```
mylifebox.com#@#.social-media-container
mylifebox.com#@#.social-media-list
```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: yandex.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

issue.title: otvet.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body:
> нужно установить AdGuard Extra?

Да, это нужно сделать, поскольку реклама блокируется нашим скриптом.

issue.title: yandex.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

comment.body: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/116448#issuecomment-1133482790 установите AdGuard Extra из первого поста.

Что касается твоего правила, то к элементу лучше подходить и вместо `:has-text()` мы используем `:contains()`.

issue.title: [Question] Cookies
issue.body:
Hello!
Can you please tell me if I can block the cookies of all sites other than those selected by the following rules:
- $cookie
- @@$cookie,domain=example.com

In this particular case, I need to disable all cookies except example.com

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
Stream is not available. Did the rule help?

issue.title: Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion doesn't work the way it suppose to
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension, AdGuard for Safari, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

AdGuard Browser Extension 4.0.171, AdGuard for Safari 1.11.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome, Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

yandex.ru or google.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track header

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Steps to reproduce:
- Enable self promotion filter
- Go to google/yandex
- Search for anything (ex. "buy shoes")

### Expected result: 
There should be self-promotion advertising
### Actual: 
It's blocked

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: streamgo.to
issue.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/119613

popunder

comment.body:
>the rule does not work on iOS

The same on my device.

Could you please add all these rules:
```
cdn1.link###adholder
vikistream.com,embedstream.me,streamgo.to#%#//scriptlet("prevent-window-open")
streamgo.to#%#//scriptlet("abort-on-property-write", "_pop")
vikistream.com,streamgo.to#%#//scriptlet("abort-current-inline-script", "document.createElement", "delete window")
vikistream.com$$script[wildcard="*function*break;case*"][min-length="30000"][max-length="100000"]
```
These rules seem to work fine for me.

issue.title: streamgo.to
issue.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/119613

popunder

comment.body:
It seems that I was wrong and `cdn1.link###adholder` also doesn't work.
This one works fine:
```
cdn1.link$$div[id="adholder"]
```

<hr>

> `vikistream.com,streamgo.to#%#//scriptlet("abort-current-inline-script", "document.createElement", "delete window")`
> Of note I see propeller delete-window staff only in `vikistream.com` and not in `streamgo.to`.

I know, but iOS is problematic and as I recall there was issue (or it was by design) that rules were not applied to iframes, so domain from "top" document have to be used.

issue.title: streamgo.to
issue.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/119613

popunder

comment.body:
@jellizaveta Could you please add these rules:
```
cdn1.link$$div[id="adholder"]
vikistream.com,embedstream.me,streamgo.to#%#//scriptlet("prevent-window-open")
vikistream.com,streamgo.to#%#//scriptlet("abort-current-inline-script", "document.createElement", "delete window")
vikistream.com$$script[wildcard="*function*break;case*"][min-length="30000"][max-length="100000"]
```

comment.body:
Jeśli problem występuje nawet po wyłączeniu AdGuarda (drugi zrzut ekranu), to prawdopodobnie powoduje go coś innego.
Spróbuj proszę wyłączyć inne rozszerzenia, a potem sprawdź ponownie. Gdyby problem nadal występował, to sprawdź proszę, czy po wyłączeniu AdGuarda w ustawieniach przeglądarki nadal dzieje się to samo. Jak tak, to skontaktuj się proszę z pomocą techniczną `vinted.pl`.

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://twitter.com/home](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fhome) ### Comment > For some curious reason, in this GitHub thread (https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/119048) a filter contributor points out that the server Twitter uses to play videos needs to be blocked, and the rule ended up being added to Adguard Base. (I leave it marked in the picture I attached from GitHub). > > The solution would be to override the change that was made on May 23 (https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/119048) so that Twitter videos will play again. ### Screenshots

issue.title: namu.wiki

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

labels.name: List-KR
labels.description: Problematic issues, handled in List-KR

issue.body:
# 나무위키의 파워링크 및 기타 광고 차단을 위한 지침

최근 나무위키에서 지속적인 파워링크 필터 대응에 따라 많은 광고 차단기 필터들이 재대응을 목표로 하고 있습니다.
빠른 대응 속도에 광고 차단기의 필터 업데이트 속도가 따라가지 못해 현재 많은 수의 오차단이 발생하고 있습니다.

즉, 저희가 필터를 업데이트하여도 실제로 여러분의 광고 차단기는 업데이트를 제때 받지 못할 수도 있다는 문제점이 있습니다.

더욱 효과적인 차단을 위해 아래 사항을 권고드립니다.

## 광고 차단기의 설정을 업데이트하여 필터 업데이트 속도 개선

<details>
AdGuard나 여타 광고 차단기에서의 빠른 필터 업데이트를 위해 기존 필터 목록에서 List-KR을 제외하고 사용자 지정 필터 목록에 List-KR을 신뢰된 필터로 추가하세요.

### Windows, Android 및 웹 브라우저 확장 프로그램 (Safari 제외)

- https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/236#issue-1168415899

### iOS 및 macOS의 AdGuard for Safari

아래 글을 참고하여 추가로 필터 패치가 필요합니다.

- https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/236#issuecomment-1084964861
</details>

## 광고가 차단되지 않았을 때 / 잘못 차단되었을 때

<details>
나무위키의 차단은 현재 IP 대역 및 기타 환경에 따라 다르게 보일 수 있다고 추정하고 있습니다.
광고가 정상적으로 차단되지 않은 경우에는 **로그인 여부** 및 **사용하시는 통신사** 등의 환경을 추가로 댓글에 기입해주시면 더 나은 대응이 가능합니다.
또 차단되지 않은 페이지의 DOM 구조 또한 파악이 필요한데 사용하시는 웹 브라우저에서 우클릭 후 웹 사이트 저장을 통해 추가 정보를 업로드해주시면 감사하겠습니다.

개인정보가 포함된 경우 Thunderbird 등의 메일 암호화 서비스를 통하여 아래의 지원 이메일 주소 중 하나로 암호화된 메일을 전송해주십시오.

- https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/223

> 그 외 타 광고 차단 필터를 사용하면 DOM 구조가 정상적으로 표지되지 않을 수 있으니 광고 차단기를 끄고 저장해주세요.
</details>

## 성능 문제의 발생

<details>
저희는 현재 이미 경우에 따라 성능 문제가 발생할 수 있음을 인지하고 있습니다.
성능 문제는 광고 차단기의 나무위키의 DOM을 검사하는 과정에서 패턴을 인식하는데에 과도한 리소스가 사용되어 발생하는 것입니다.
이는 장기적인 목표로 해결되어야 하지만 단기적으로 빠른 차단을 위해 발생할 수 있습니다.
성능 문제로 인해 불편을 감수하시는 경우 현재 레포지토리의 최근 커밋 목록을 참조하여 필터 규칙을 따로 비활성화할 수 있도록 하십시오.

규칙을 비활성화하려면 `namu.wiki#@#`로 시작하는 규칙을 사용자 규칙에 추가하면 됩니다.

### 직접 광고를 차단하기

이 때에는 직접 광고를 차단하실 수 있도록 사용하시는 광고 차단기에서 **직접 웹 사이트의 요소 차단** 기능을 이용하시는 것이 권장됩니다.

> 단, 현재 방식으로 생성된 규칙을 저장소에 전송하지 마세요. 나무위키의 구조는 무작위로 변경되는 특성이 있어 다른 사람에게 적용되지 않거나 너무 많이 업데이트해야 할 수도 있습니다.
</details>

_Originally posted by @seia-soto in https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/236#issuecomment-1086910452_

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.title: test
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

### Prerequisites

#### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [ ] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [ ] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

### What problem does the pull request fix?

#### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

### What issue is being fixed?

#### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [ ] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: AdGuard Annoyances filter sets google.com CONSENT cookie on chrome://whats-new/
issue.body: ### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard Browser Extension ### AdGuard version 4.0.163 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc. ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? chrome://whats-new/ ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard Annoyances filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots The AdGuard annoyances filter causes a CONSENT cookie to be set for google.com whenever I open chrome://whats-new/ (which happened for example after I updated to Chrome version 102). This is despite the fact that I have google.com set under "Sites that can never use cookies" on chrome://settings/cookies If I disable the AdGuard annoyances filter, then this issue does not occur. ### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition
